message.content:
I need to identify the line item that shows the increase in tax accrued but not yet paid from the cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement provided, I can see there's a line item called "Increase (Decrease) in Tax Payable" with a value of 418090.41.

The "Tax Payable" represents taxes that have been accrued but not yet paid. When this value is positive in a cash flow statement, it indicates an increase in the amount of tax accrued but not yet paid during the period.

Since the value is 418090.41, this is the specific amount of increase in tax accrued but not yet paid.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '418090.41'} }
```
